description: Represents an async transcription run. Poll this resource until status is COMPLETED or FAILED.

uid.description: Unique identifier of the transcription run.

status.description: Current status of the run. Possible values: 'QUEUED' (job is waiting to be processed), 'IN_PROGRESS' (job is actively being processed by the transcription provider), 'COMPLETED' (job finished successfully and result is available), 'FAILED' (job encountered an error and error_message is available).

created_at.description: The date and time when the run was created, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2026-02-08T13:18:39.698Z").

updated_at.description: The date and time when the run was last updated, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2026-02-08T13:18:41.000Z").

result.description: The transcription result. Only present when status is 'COMPLETED'.

error_message.description: Error message describing the failure reason. Only present when status is 'FAILED'.
